site.title: Anugrah Ilhami Rizki
site.description: Fullstack web developer. Specializes in React, Next.js, Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL.

author.name: Anugrah Ilhami Rizki
author.bio: A Computer Engineering graduate with hands-on experience in Back-End Development. Specializing in developing RESTful APIs using Node.js, Express.js, and relational databases such as PostgreSQL and MySQL. Experienced in some projects such as E-Wallet API, visitor management system, and online learning platform.
